name: Huawei Mate 80 Pro Max
highlights:
Released 2025, November 25
239g, 8.3mm thickness
HarmonyOS 6.0
512GB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, aluminum alloy back
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 6m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, 1440Hz PWM, HDR Vivid, 8000 nits (peak)

MAIN CAMERA.Quad:
50 MP, f/1.4-f/4.0, 24mm (wide), PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.1, 91mm (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 4x optical zoom
50 MP, f/3.2, 140mm (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 6.2x optical zoom
40 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120Ëš (ultrawide), PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, LED flash, panorama, HDR

COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC

FEATURES.Sensors: Face ID, fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass
FEATURES: BDS Satellite Calling and Messaging - China only

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired
80W wireless
20W reverse wireless
18W reverse wired
